Deficiency Narrative: One child's admission assessment did not include information related dental examinations.
Correction Narrative: Per email from CEO, the admission assessments were updated in all child records to include dental status and exam results. The Administrator will receive refresher training in completing admission assessments, with emphasis on documenting both medical and dental history. The Admission Coordinator will use a checklist at intake to verify that all sections, including dental, are completed before the file is finalized. The Program Director or designee will review all new admission assessments within 48 hours of intake to ensure compliance.

Deficiency Narrative: Two out of two child records did not have information related to medication side effects listed.
Correction Narrative: Per email from CEO, the preliminary service plans were updated in all child records to include all education, medical and dental needs along with medication listed with side effects. The Program Director or designee will conduct a weekly file review to ensure all required documentation, including medication side effects, is present and up to date. A Quality Assurance checklist will be implemented to verify that all Preliminary Service Plans are complete before final approval.

Deficiency Narrative: Two staff records reviewed did not contain reference checks documented in the employee file.
Correction Narrative: Per email from CEO, the pre-employment screening template form will be used to document verified reference checks for all employees. This form will be stored electronically and in personnel files. The operation will ensure reference checks will be completed prior to hire approval. The Administrator will conduct monthly audits of new fire files.

Deficiency Narrative: Two personnel records reviewed did not contain a document indicating the operational policies were reviewed by the employee.
Correction Narrative: Per email from CEO, the Personnel Policy Acknowledgement Form was modified and reviewed for compliance. The modified form will be signed by all staff. The operation will conduct policy reviewed every January and policy review meets with re-signatures as when policies are updated. Administration/HR will conduct quarterly personnel file audit. The modified form will be added to the onboarding packet checklist.
